function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Controversy surrounding the impact of higher density on social interactions and sustainability","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased density in offices due to altered office spaces and remote working policies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased cost and inefficiency of high-rise buildings due to altered office space requirements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective cleaning policies leading to increased spread of infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded living conditions leading to the spread of communicable diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social isolation and protection from viruses in housing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate office space for remote working","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended time indoors could lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission within housing and office spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adaptation in housing and office design to accommodate workspaces and reduce density could lead to prolonged health risks and reduced productivity.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient construction strategies and materials could contribute to suboptimal building designs and delay the implementation of health-conscious features.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to working from home for some people based on socioeconomic status, leading to challenges in social distancing and infection prevention.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges with social distancing and infection prevention in smaller and crowded houses or spaces without outside areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on urban design and public spaces, with potential for increased risk of disease transmission in crowded urban environments.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital channels in the built environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population density in cities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Household size and family structure","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical pandemics like cholera, typhoid, tuberculosis, and the third plague pandemic have influenced the design and infrastructure of the built environment, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The current health crisis, particularly the covid-19 pandemic, has directly impacted urban planning and architecture, necessitating the development of built environments with enhanced security measures to prevent the spread of infections and diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research conducted to imagine how the antivirus-built environment would look","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social distancing and quarantine as a design problem in the post-pandemic era","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical precedents of infectious diseases driving urban renewal and architectural design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreading in built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragility of the real world","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Virus attacks on digital and built environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-coronavirus-2 rna in sewage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Volumes processed in rna extraction","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Possible higher covid-19 prevalence in the community than reported through clinical surveillance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity of estimating covid-19 prevalence based on sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in sewage.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sewage data serving as a sensitive tool for early warning of increasing virus circulation in the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scatter in combined data of all wwtp due to variations in virus rna recovery and concentration in wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of virus in sewage before reported covid-19 cases in the population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in city sewage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage and its correlation with reported covid-19 cases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 in sewage samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in sensitivity of primer/probe sets for sars-cov-2 rna detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate recovery efficiency of coronavirus in wastewater samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of non-enveloped f+ rna phages for estimating coronavirus recovery efficiency","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unreliable quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage due to qrt-pcr assay limitations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection and quantification of sars-coronavirus-2 rna in sewage samples.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proxy for the period prevalence of covid-19 in the cities served by the wwtp.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recovery efficiency of f-specific rna phages in purification and concentration steps.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential underreporting of covid-19 cases due to limited testing of individuals with severe symptoms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on sewage surveillance as a sole early warning system for re- emergence of covid-19 in cities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in domestic wastewater suggesting circulation of covid-19 in communities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via respiratory droplets and fomites","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in sewage and potential for health risks to workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increas in virus load in sewer systems due to circulation of the virus in the population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Publication of controversial health guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data duration less than four months in the selected studies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"}]}
